text: Ni na we waremye ibimera birandaranda n’ibitarandaranda, imitende, ibimera bitandukanye mu buryohe, imizeti n’imikomamanga, isa (mu miterere) n’idasa (mu buryohe). Ngaho nimurye imbuto zabyo igihe byeze, ariko igihe cy’isarura mujye mutangaho umugabane wagenwe (amaturo). Kandi ntimugasesagure kuko mu by’ukuri (Allah) adakunda abasesagura
